title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.15 - Hunting and trapping
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.15 - Hunting and trapping

State Regulations

No person shall, within the parkway system, hunt, trap, molest, kill, wound, take, chase, shoot or throw missiles at, remove, or have
in his possession any animal, reptile, bird, bird's nest or squirrel's nest, or
remove the young of any animal or the eggs or young of any reptile or bird; or
knowingly buy, receive, have in his possession, sell or give away any animal, reptile, bird or egg so killed or taken. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
